thread.title: Paige Doherty's murderer John Leathem viciously beaten by serial rapist as he ate his tea in jail - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Paige Doherty's murderer John Leathem viciously beaten by serial rapist as he ate his tea in jail - Mirror Online

author: Chris Kitching
title: Paige Doherty's murderer John Leathem viciously beaten by serial rapist as he ate his tea in jail - Mirror Online
text:
News Paige Doherty's murderer John Leathem viciously beaten by serial rapist as he ate his tea in jail John Leathem was attacked just two days after he switched jails amid claims that fellow inmates were plotting to murder him Share The attack occurred after John Leathem was moved to a new prison (Photo: Police Scotland) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The man who brutally murdered 15-year-old Paige Doherty has been attacked by a rapist in jail. 
John Leathem, 32, was beaten just two days after he switched jails amid claims that fellow inmates were plotting to murder him. 
A source said the killer was eating his tea when he was punched in the head and face by serial rapist James Gellately. 
The dining hall attack came to an end when two guards at HMP Dumfries dragged Gellately, 29, off of Leathem, reports The Sun . Serial rapist James Gellately attacked Leathem in a dining hall (Photo: Police Scotland) 
After the attack Gellately was sent to solitary confinement and transferred to another prison . Read More Transgender murderer moved from women’s prison ‘after having sex with female inmates’ 
Deli owner Leathem pleaded guilty to murder and was sentenced to 27 years in prison for repeatedly stabbing Paige on March 19 last year and dumping her body in bushes. 
The schoolgirl was left with nearly 150 injuries, including 61 stab wounds, when the married father-of-two attacked her with a knife at his shop in Clydebank, West Dunbartonshire. 
A source confirmed to Mirror Online that Leathem was moved to Dumfries from HMP Low Moss amid claims that prisoners were planning to kill him. Paige Doherty, 15, was killed in a frenzied knife attack (Photo: Police Scotland/PA) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
